item.title: CVE-2024-31346|2024-04-07T17:37:49.741Z -- Blocksmarket -- Gradient Text Widget for Elementor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Blocksmarket Gradient Text Widget for Elementor allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Gradient Text Widget for Elementor: from n/a through 1.0.1.
